title: In the Ride of the Valkyries by Richard Wagner, what are the Valkyries? - Quora

response.answer_text: As the other answer: Valkyries are mythical women on flying horses who carry fallen heroic soldiers to the Valhalla. They also shield these soldiers and fight by their side. In the opera, the god Wotan (for reasons) forbids his favourite Valkyrie from helping the hero Siegmund. The famous theme plays when she’s just disobeyed him and meets with the other valkyries.
The Valkyries are mythical women on flying horseback who carry the bodies of heroic soldiers from the battlefield into Valhalla.
